name: The boy
description:
Deadlines with my Demons #2
#Herbie7777777
CN
--------------
He is about 7 when he meets his new friend. 
He changes to a school in another district at the age of 8. 
He's been acting up lately – the doctor says it's his ADHD that makes it hard for him to stay still during class. The teachers like to show the boy who is boss. 
After school, he likes to draw or read comic books.
He has only a few friends in his hometown. 
An absent father. His mom has to work a lot, she’s raising two kids on her own.

His new neighborhood friend has a lot of time for him though.
--------------
2480x3508, 300dpi
